title: Non-existant game?
body: I was in a co-op vs ai game, and it wouldn't load in so I quit. I don't mind the ban or that part. What is now happening, now that the game ended, the client is trying to make me re-join a game that doesn't exist, and on the client where it says 'In-Game' when I hover over, instead of displaying (blue circle) - [game type] - [champion, I played Zed], it showed (blue circle) - - Zed. I find this annoying.

replies.body: I believe this is called a 'ghost game'. Generally I've found it goes away after re-logging a few times, or waiting an hour or so. So try doing that, and if it doesn't work let me know and I'll look into it a bit more for you.
